item.title: Aljazeera RSS plugin
item.description:
I developed this WordPress plugin and published it for years on the WordPress plugin directory. It was fetching the latest news from Aljazeera Arabic Website using RSS. It utilizes SimplePie script which is already integrated into WordPress.

I added some options to the widget menus and it worked great. I kept updating the plugin for years. Currently, I stopped developing it and started, but the source code is available on GitHub.

item.title: Ketab Wordpress Theme
item.description:
A responsive vantage WordPress theme created while learning theme design and development years ago. I designed and developed it from scratch without using frameworks (except for styling, I used bootstrap).

It had a classic simple design. It was installable using the WordPress menu. It worked great! It was a learning project, but it needs some updates to work with the latest WordPress version.
